name: Captain Firehawk and the Laser Love Situation
name_original: Captain Firehawk and the Laser Love Situation
description:
A bullet-hell shooter where your bullets strip off clothing pieces from giant, skyscraper-sized girls! Inspired by many classics from the golden age of arcades, Captain Firehawk pays respect to the shoot-em-up genre, putting a comedic and raunchy twist on the classic formula.


When enormous, size-morphing vixens begin attacking planets throughout the galaxy, only one man is able to stand against them and put things right- a pizza guy with a pilot's license: Captain Firehawk. He must rely on his wits, reflexes, and retro gaming skills in order to take down these dastardly damsels and save the day!

Featuring visual novel story segments with animated character sprites- story and gameplay go hand in hand to create the ultimate analog arcade experience for the modern era!


  • Retro Love Letter: PC-98 inspired graphics with 21st century sensibilities!
  • Hot Anime Girls: Meet and befriend a colorful cast of sexy ladies!
  • Nudity & Clothing Destruction: Shoot 'em up to strip them down!
